methods.name: <init>

params.name: locationAddr
params.comment: the address of the listing location (i.e., referent code unit)

params.name: charOffset
params.comment: the position within the function signature string for this location.

params.name: signature
params.comment: the function signature string at this location.

params.name: parameter
params.comment: the function parameter at this location.

methods.javadoc:
Default constructor needed for restoring
 a program location from XML
methods.name: <init>
methods.comment:
Default constructor needed for restoring
 a program location from XML

methods.name: getParameter
methods.comment:
Returns the parameter associated with this location.  This value can be null if the 
 parameters are deleted from the function associated with the address of the parameter.

methods.javadoc: Returns a String representation of this location.
methods.name: toString
methods.comment: Returns a String representation of this location.
